data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Bishnupur, Manipur, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bishnupur, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bishnupur, Manipur, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Bishnupur, Manipur, India will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Bishnupur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Meitei Kshatriya people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Please, convict the 2,611 believers in Bishnupur, Manipur, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 2,611 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bishnupur, Manipur, India has a population of 237,400.

We estimate Bishnupur has 2,611 people who might know Jesus, 2,880 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 231,908 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Bishnupur a passion to plant another simple church.
